name: SpaceBlast
description:
Mods:

Major mod: Wrote script to move game objects in linear, circular and sinusoidal paths. The follow mode was only available on enemies and enemies followed the target using the shortest line segment. The new script will allow any attached game object to be moved.

1. Player guns overheat. If fire button held down player fire rate slows linearly until max firing delay is reached after 5 seconds. If mouse button is released fire rate will return to normal.

2. Accuracy rating display. Accuracy is calculated as hits / shots fired by player and is updated in real time! Accuracy affects the score multiplier. 

3. Dynamic environmental obstacles - Flying asteroids that will periodically fly through the game screen and smash anything in the way

4. Dynamic enemies: Enemies that move in circular orbits and sinusoidal pattern s making them hard to hit.

Also enabled collisions for enemies so that if player runs into enemy sprites they will take damage.
